hero.title: AI‑Powered Sales Funnel
hero.subtitle: Attract, qualify and convert 24/7 with automated multichannel journeys.

pitch.subtitle_long: We design a full AI funnel: acquisition on ads and landing, qualification on WhatsApp/Chat, email/DM nurturing and auto‑scheduling. All orchestrated and measured to optimize ROAS and close rate.

definition.what_is: An AI‑orchestrated system connecting ads, landing, chat/WhatsApp, CRM and calendars to convert more and better with less manual effort.
key_benefits: Faster response times and better experience.
Scale campaigns with true conversion data.

pains: Too many cold leads without qualification.
Hard to attribute sales to campaigns.

steps.title: Strategy & journey
steps.desc: Value prop, offer and per‑channel flow.

faqs.a: Recommended. We integrate with HubSpot, Pipedrive or others. If you don’t have one, we suggest a lightweight option.

faqs.q: How fast can we see impact?
faqs.a: In 2–4 weeks you’ll likely see response and scheduling improvements; ROAS improves with iterations.

faqs.q: Does this replace my sales team?
faqs.a: No. AI automates repetitive work and qualification; closing remains with your team with better focus.
